recipesJson.name: MB's Nilla MintyShake  (remake)
recipesJson.author: MECH_MOD_RN
recipesJson.description:
picked up LB vanilla mint and was surprised that it is more of a spearmint then a straight mint   that is really pleasant and not over powering as some mint can be.   - thought  it would make a nice milk shake  
LOOKING for a group to learn about  mixing your own juice check out these groups and your tube channels  
https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
https://www.diydownunder.com/ 
https://www.youtube.com/user/frank1360
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-0xkeZFSG04
